quote: My biggest fear is not crashing on a bike… It’s sitting in a chair at 90 and saying, “I wish I had done more”
author: Graeme Obree

quote: Running would be much better if they invented a little seat to sit on and maybe some kind of platforms for your feet to push and… Oh wait.
author: Liz Hatch

quote: I get paid to hurt other people, how good is that?
author: Jens Voigt

quote: A bicycle ride around the world begins with a single pedal stroke.
author: Scott Stoll

quote: Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime. Teach a man to cycle and he will realize fishing is stupid and boring.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Melancholy is incompatible with bicycling.
author: James E Starrs

quote: When my legs hurt, I say: “Shut up legs! Do what I tell you to do!”
author: Jens Voigt

quote: Sometimes, on a really long climb, when I feel like I am at my limit and I look up and see it just keeps going, I think about stopping. Then I think "Then what, you're still going to keep climbing but you will be mad you stopped"... so I keep going.
author: unknown

quote: Go into the future and see it, come back in the present and take that big dream and break it down into the small steps to make it a reality.
author: unknown

quote: Think big, Dream big, but start small. Start where you are, with what you have, because what you have is plenty.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: If there is no enemy within than the enemy outside can do us no harm.
author: African Proverb

quote: There are so many things that you should have done that you didn't do because you are scared. Scared of failure. Scared to make a mistake. Scared that you're not perfect. You don't have to be perfect to get what you want, be what you want, to have what you want, it's a lie!
author: unknown

quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: If things seem under control, you are just not going fast enough.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Everyone has a 'risk muscle.' You keep it in shape by trying new things. If you don't, it atrophies. Make a point of using it at least once a day.
author: Roger von Oech

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Mary Schmich

quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: Think big and don't listen to people who tell you it can't be done. Life's too short to think small.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Greatness is a lot of small things done well. Day after day, workout after workout, obedience after obedience, day after day.
author: unknown

quote: Never be comfortable with just good enough.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: Don’t let your alarm clock be the only reason you wake up.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: It has nothing to do with talent, and everything to do with effort! Wins and losses come a dime a dozen. But effort? Nobody can judge that. Because effort is between you and you.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: It never gets easier, you just go faster.
author: Greg LeMond

quote: When your legs scream "Stop" and your lungs are bursting, that’s when it starts. That’s the hurt locker. Winners love it in there.
author: Chris McCormack

quote: “You can’t get good by staying home. If you want to get fast, you have to go where the fast guys are.
author: Steve Larsen

quote: The race is won by the rider who can suffer the most.
author: Eddy Merckx

quote: When it’s hurting you, that’s when you can make a difference.
author: Eddy Merckx

quote: If you go (with a break), you can either win or not win. If you don’t go for it, you definitely won’t win.
author: Jens Voigt

quote: As long as I breathe, I attack!
author: Bernard Hinault

quote: The best rides are the ones where you bite off much more than you can chew, and live through it.
author: Doug Bradbury

quote: What is the best way to get faster on the bike? Ride a bike. Ride a bike. Ride a bike.
author: Fausto Coppi

quote: Good morale in cycling comes from good legs.
author: Sean Yates

quote: I inherited that calm from my father, who was a farmer. You sow, you wait for good or bad weather, you harvest, but working is something you always need to do.
author: Miguel Indurain

quote: Enjoy the suffering; pain is only weakness leaving the body.
author: Paul Howard

quote: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Going into a race with the attitude of, “Well, I’ll see what happens,” means nothing is going to happen; or at least nothing you’re involved in.
author: Chris Carmichael

quote: Yeah it hurts! Everybody hurts! Just go!
author: Anonymous
